name: webit-de/formhandler-clearlog-task
description: This TYPO3 CMS backend extension adds the formhandler log table to the »Table garbage collection« & »Anonymize IP addresses« scheduler task.

suggest.formhandler: This package requires EXT:formhandler which is not maintained anymore and has no Packagist entry → use patch version https://github.com/webit-de/typo3-formhandler/ instead
